title: Charlier - 36 Etudes for Trumpet (New - Sample wFonts).pdf
description:
This PDF file features the first two of Charlier&#039;s famous ADVANCED ETUDES FOR TRUMPET. 


This edition is part of an ongoing project to completely re-typeset this indispensable work for the modern age. In addition to razor-sharp printing (using Coda Music&#039;s FINALE, the industry standard for musical typesetting), it is also designed for printing on standard 8.5 x 11 pages (the original printing is a larger non-standard size which easily became ragged and torn when carried around).  The emphasis is on an extremely high degree of legibility, using multiple pages when necessary. 

This is NOT a re-edit. All of the original edition&#039;s markings (slurs, ties, breath marks, text notations, etc), are all faithfully reproduced (the exception being a somewhat reduced number of "courtesy" accidentals, which in no way affects the final performance). Again, the goal of this project is to create a printed version for a modern age, but not to re-edit the content of the music itself.

I am putting these two completed etudes out in order to get feedback on the project, so as to hear what other trumpet players feel works or doesn&#039;t work. So, if you&#039;d like to see the complete edition, please leave your comments. My goal is to re-typeset one etude per day over the next month, followed by a couple of days of final proofing.

Enjoy!
